text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify that acts requiring prior judicial authorization include acceptance of inheritance with benefit of inventory. The candidate answer discusses the powers and limitations of the *amministrazione di sostegno* (guardianship) in Italy, mentioning that selling/renting property requires court authorization, but it never specifically mentions or lists 'acceptance of inheritance with benefit of inventory' (*accettazione dell'eredit\u00e0 con beneficio d'inventario*) as an act requiring prior judicial authorization.", "criterion_id": "c5696981-b9bf-47e5-ba65-e454985f2a15"}
